title: Lima Shanty Town Tour-Local Life Experience
description: Discover a different side of Lima during this tour of one of the city’s shantytowns. Meet some of the residents of this community during this walking tour as you learn about the challenges they face. Visit a kindergarten and some local artisans to hear stories about daily life in the shantytown. Part of the proceeds go back to helping the community and its residents.
all_descriptions: Discover a different side of Lima during this tour of one of the city’s shantytowns. Meet some of the residents of this community during this walking tour as you learn about the challenges they face. Visit a kindergarten and some local artisans to hear stories about daily life in the shantytown. Part of the proceeds go back to helping the community and its residents.

Meet your guide at your central Lima hotel and head towards the shantytown. Receive a short briefing about basic guidelines for the tour before heading in. Wander the alleyways and listen to informative commentary from your guide about the history of the community and its residents.

Meet local residents throughout the tour to get a deeper look at their daily lives. Stop at a kindergarten and a silverware factory and listen to stories about the developments within the community. Walk up the ‘yellow stairs’ to take in the astounding dimensions of the shantytown as well as the views of the city below before heading back your hotel to conclude the tour.
Av. José Larco 724, Miraflores 15074, PeruDear client, if you don't need pick up, you can meet us at our office located at Av. Jose Larco 724, Miraflores.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

Deborah A
Berlin, Germany20 contributions

Meaningful and Inspiring Shanti Tour with José – Highly Recommended!

Aug 2025 • Couples
We had a fantastic experience today on our Shanti Tour through Lima with our guide, José. He picked us up from our hotel right on time, and from the beginning, we felt well taken care of.

Our first stop was Villa El Salvador, where we visited a local market. This was a great and authentic experience – we spoke with local vendors, had the chance to try some products, and could even buy something if we wanted. It really gave us a feel for the local atmosphere.

After that, we headed to Velo Horizonte, where we visited several social projects that are supported by this tour. These included a school for children, a center for the elderly, and a community soup kitchen. Each visit was informative and eye-opening. José explained everything very clearly and gave us a deep insight into the daily life and challenges in the area.

He spoke excellent English and was able to answer all our questions thoroughly and thoughtfully. His calm and respectful manner made the whole experience even more meaningful.

This tour goes beyond traditional sightseeing – it offers real perspective and supports important local initiatives. We left with a lot to think about and a deep appreciation for the community work being done.

100% recommended – amazing guide, great service, and a tour that truly makes a difference!
Written August 3, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

1 contribution

One-of-a-kind experience!

Jul 2025 • Solo
This was definitely a one-of-a-kind experience unlike any other touristy tours offered in Lima. I am so glad I decided to go on this experience and get to meet Tuanama who is such an inspiration. My guide, Maverick, was also so friendly and knowledgeable. I went on the tour as a solo female and felt safe the entire time. I highly recommend this experience if you want something that you’ll remember for a lifetime!
Written July 12, 2025

Valdosta, GA7 contributions

Awesome experience!

This was a memorable tour. Paola and Cesar did a great job sharing the history of Lima and the Shanty towns. Being able to visit a local market and the soup kitchen was a great experience. The locals we met and interacted with very friendly. Our driver was courteous and drove safely. We recommend this tour to anyone that wants to experience something different than the touristy areas of Lima.
Written June 18, 2025

May 2025 • Solo
A great experience in this area of Lima. Local market with interesting exchange with some traders. Nice meeting with the community leader.
Leonardo is a kind and very friendly guide. There are no taboo questions with him..

Carrie
New Orleans, LA175 contributions

A Side of Lima One Should See!

This was a most interesting and humbling tour. JJ navigated us through the community with respect and kindness to all we met. The tour takes you out of the city and into the lives of those less fortunate. I loved meeting the woman who runs the community kitchen and is a real change agent for the neighborhood.
Bring water and he prepared to climb some steps. This was one of the best tours I have ever taken. What a great idea from Haku Tours!
Written March 15, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Roam60415588556
Thank you for sharing your thoughtful experience! We’re so glad to hear that JJ provided a respectful and meaningful tour, allowing you to connect with the community and its inspiring leaders. Meeting the woman running the community kitchen sounds like a truly impactful moment. We appreciate your advice for future guests, and we're honored to have been part of such an incredible journey. We look forward to welcoming you again for more unforgettable experiences with Haku Tours!

reviews.title: A great shantytown experience
